author: alice
content: Hey team, the new authentication service is ready for review. I've added OAuth2 support with refresh tokens.

author: bob
content: Nice! I'll take a look. Did you add rate limiting on the token endpoint?

author: alice
content: Not yet — it's on my list. Wanted to get the core flow reviewed first before adding the extras.

author: charlie
content: I'd prioritize rate limiting before merging. We got hit by a brute force attempt last month.

author: alice
content: Good point. I'll add it today and update the PR.

author: diana
content: Q1 roadmap is finalized. Top priorities: onboarding revamp, dashboard analytics, and mobile push notifications.

author: bob
content: Dashboard analytics is going to be heavy on the backend. We should sync with eng early.

author: diana
content: Agreed. I'll set up a cross-team meeting for Thursday. Can you prep a rough estimate?

author: bob
content: Sure, I'll have something by Wednesday EOD.

author: eve
content: Database migration for the new schema is done. Ran it in staging — no issues. Ready for prod when you are.

author: charlie
content: Let's do the prod migration during the maintenance window tonight. I'll monitor.

author: eve
content: Sounds good. I'll prep the rollback script just in case.

author: diana
content: Reminder: company all-hands is at 3pm today. Please join on time — we have guest speakers.

author: alice
content: Will it be recorded? I have a conflict with a client call.

author: diana
content: Yes, recording will be shared in #general afterward.

author: bob
content: CI pipeline is broken on main. Looks like a flaky test in the payment module. Investigating.

author: bob
content: Found it — race condition in the mock payment gateway. Fix is up: PR #342.

author: charlie
content: Approved and merged. CI is green again.

author: eve
content: Customer feedback from last release: users love the new search but find the filters confusing.

author: diana
content: That matches our analytics. Filter usage dropped 20% after the redesign. We should simplify.

author: alice
content: I can do a quick UX audit on the filters this week. Should be a small effort.

author: eve
content: Heads up — we're seeing elevated error rates on the search API. P95 latency jumped from 200ms to 800ms.

author: alice
content: Could be related to the new index we added yesterday. Let me check the query plans.

author: alice
content: Confirmed — the new index is causing a sequential scan on large tables. I'll revert and create a proper composite index.

author: eve
content: Latency is back to normal after the index fix. Good catch, Alice.
